processes.label: Radiative Forcings
processes.description: Radiative forcings of the model for historical and scenario (aka Table 12.1 IPCC AR5)

properties.label: Name
properties.description: Commonly used name for the radiative forcings in toplevel model.

properties.label: Overview
properties.description: Overview of radiative forcings of the model for historical and scenario (aka table 12.1 ipcc ar5) in toplevel model.

properties.label: Overview
properties.description: Overview of greenhouse gas forcing agents in toplevel model.

properties.label: Provision
properties.description: How this forcing agent is provided (e.g. via concentrations, emission precursors, prognostically derived, etc.)

enum.label: Forcing Provision
enum.description: How a radiative forcing agent is provided

choices.label: N/A
choices.description: Not applicable - forcing agent is not included

choices.label: M
choices.description: Emissions and concentrations determined by the model state rather than externally prescribed

choices.label: Y
choices.description: Prescribed concentrations, distributions or time series data

choices.label: E
choices.description: Concentrations calculated interactively driven by prescribed emissions or precursor emissions

choices.label: ES
choices.description: Surface emissions (and 3-D concentrations away from the surface) derived via the model from the prescribed surface concentration

choices.label: C
choices.description: Fixed prescribed climatology of concentrations with no year-to-year variability

properties.label: Additional Information
properties.description: Additional information relating to the provision and implementation of this forcing agent (e.g. citations, use of non-standard datasets, explaining how multiple provisions are used, etc.).

properties.label: Provision

enum.label: Forcing Provision
enum.description: How a radiative forcing agent is provided

choices.label: N/A
choices.description: Not applicable - forcing agent is not included

choices.label: M
choices.description: Emissions and concentrations determined by the model state rather than externally prescribed

choices.label: Y
choices.description: Prescribed concentrations, distributions or time series data

choices.label: E
choices.description: Concentrations calculated interactively driven by prescribed emissions or precursor emissions

choices.label: ES
choices.description: Surface emissions (and 3-D concentrations away from the surface) derived via the model from the prescribed surface concentration

choices.label: C
choices.description: Fixed prescribed climatology of concentrations with no year-to-year variability

properties.label: Equivalence Concentration
properties.description: Details of any equivalence concentrations used

choices.label: N/A
choices.description: Not applicabale (CFCs not included or emissions and concentrations determined by the model state)

choices.label: Option 1
choices.description: CFCs, including CFC-12, are provided as actual concentrations

choices.label: Option 2
choices.description: CFC-12 is provided as actual concentrations and any other gases are provided as an equivalence concentration of CFC-11

choices.label: Option 3
choices.description: Ozone depleting gases, including CFC-12, are provided as an equivalence concentration of CFC-12 and all other fluorinated gases are provided as an equivalence concentration of HFC-134a

properties.label: Historical Explosive Volcanic Aerosol Implementation
properties.description: How explosive volcanic aerosol is implemented in historical simulations

enum.label: Explosive Volcanic Aerosol Implementation
enum.description: Model implementation of explosive volcanic aerosols

choices.label: Type A
choices.description: Explosive volcanic aerosol returns rapidly to zero (or near-zero) background.

choices.label: Type B
choices.description: Explosive volcanic aerosol returns rapidly to constant (average volcano)

choices.label: Type C
choices.description: Explosive volcanic aerosol returns slowly (over several decades) to constant (average volcano) background.

choices.label: Type D
choices.description: Explosive volcanic aerosol set to zero

choices.label: Type E
choices.description: Explosive volcanic aerosol set to constant (average volcano) background

properties.label: Future Explosive Volcanic Aerosol Implementation
properties.description: How explosive volcanic aerosol is implemented in future simulations

properties.label: Name
properties.description: Name of coupled model

properties.label: Keywords
properties.description: Keywords associated with coupled model

properties.label: Overview
properties.description: Top level overview of coupled model

propertySets.label: Flux Correction
propertySets.description: Flux correction properties of the model

properties.label: Details
properties.description: Describe if/how flux corrections are applied in the model

propertySets.label: Genealogy
propertySets.description: Genealogy and history of the model

properties.label: Year Released
properties.description: Year the model was released

properties.label: CMIP3 Parent
properties.description: CMIP3 parent if any

properties.label: CMIP5 Parent
properties.description: CMIP5 parent if any

properties.label: Previous Name
properties.description: Previously known as

properties.label: Repository
properties.description: Location of code for this component.

properties.label: Code Version
properties.description: Code version identifier.

properties.label: Code Languages
properties.description: Code language(s).

properties.label: Components Structure
properties.description: Describe how model realms are structured into independent software components (coupled via a coupler) and internal software components.

properties.label: Coupler
properties.description: Overarching coupling framework for model.

enum.label: Coupler Framework
enum.description: Coupling software framework.

choices.label: OASIS
choices.description: The OASIS coupler - prior to OASIS-MCT

choices.label: OASIS3-MCT
choices.description: The MCT variant of the OASIS coupler

choices.label: ESMF
choices.description: Vanilla Earth System Modelling Framework

choices.label: NUOPC
choices.description: National Unified Operational Prediction Capability variant of ESMF

choices.label: Bespoke
choices.description: Customised coupler developed for this model

choices.label: Unknown
choices.description: It is not known what/if-a coupler is used

choices.label: None
choices.description: No coupler is used

properties.label: Overview
properties.description: Overview of  in toplevel model.

properties.label: Overview
properties.description: Overview of coupling in the model

properties.label: Atmosphere Double Flux
properties.description: Is the atmosphere passing a double flux to the ocean and sea ice (as opposed to a single one)?

properties.label: Atmosphere Fluxes Calculation Grid
properties.description: Where are the air-sea fluxes calculated

enum.label: Atmosphere Fluxes Calculation Grid
enum.description: Where are the air-sea fluxes calculated

properties.label: Atmosphere Relative Winds
properties.description: Are relative or absolute winds used to compute the flux? I.e. do ocean surface currents enter the wind stress calculation?

properties.label: Overview
properties.description: Overview of tuning methodology for model in toplevel model.

properties.label: Description
properties.description: General overview description of tuning: explain and motivate the main targets and metrics/diagnostics retained. Document the relative weight given to climate performance metrics/diagnostics versus process oriented metrics/diagnostics, and on the possible conflicts with parameterization level tuning. In particular describe any struggle with a parameter value that required pushing it to its limits to solve a particular model deficiency.

properties.label: Global Mean Metrics Used
properties.description: List set of metrics/diagnostics of the global mean state used in tuning model

properties.label: Regional Metrics Used
properties.description: List of regional metrics/diagnostics of mean state (e.g THC, AABW, regional means etc) used in tuning model/component

properties.label: Trend Metrics Used
properties.description: List observed trend metrics/diagnostics used in tuning model/component (such as 20th century)

properties.label: Energy Balance
properties.description: Describe how energy balance was obtained in the full system: in the various components independently or at the components coupling stage?

properties.label: Fresh Water Balance
properties.description: Describe how fresh_water balance was obtained in the full system: in the various components independently or at the components coupling stage?

subProcesses.label: Conservation
subProcesses.description: Global convervation properties of the model

properties.label: Overview
properties.description: Overview of global convervation properties of the model in toplevel model.

propertySets.label: Heat
propertySets.description: Global heat convervation properties of the model

properties.label: Global
properties.description: Describe if/how heat is conserved globally

properties.label: Atmos Ocean Interface
properties.description: Describe if/how heat is conserved at the atmosphere/ocean coupling interface

properties.label: Atmos Land Interface
properties.description: Describe if/how heat is conserved at the atmosphere/land coupling interface

properties.label: Atmos Sea-ice Interface
properties.description: Describe if/how heat is conserved at the atmosphere/sea-ice coupling interface

properties.label: Ocean Seaice Interface
properties.description: Describe if/how heat is conserved at the ocean/sea-ice coupling interface

properties.label: Land Ocean Interface
properties.description: Describe if/how heat is conserved at the land/ocean coupling interface

propertySets.label: Fresh Water
propertySets.description: Global fresh water convervation properties of the model

properties.label: Global
properties.description: Describe if/how fresh_water is conserved globally

properties.label: Atmos Ocean Interface
properties.description: Describe if/how fresh_water is conserved at the atmosphere/ocean coupling interface

properties.label: Atmos Land Interface
properties.description: Describe if/how fresh water is conserved at the atmosphere/land coupling interface

properties.label: Atmos Sea-ice Interface
properties.description: Describe if/how fresh water is conserved at the atmosphere/sea-ice coupling interface

properties.label: Ocean Seaice Interface
properties.description: Describe if/how fresh water is conserved at the ocean/sea-ice coupling interface

properties.label: Runoff
properties.description: Describe how runoff is distributed and conserved

properties.label: Iceberg Calving
properties.description: Describe if/how iceberg calving is modeled and conserved

properties.label: Endoreic Basins
properties.description: Describe if/how endoreic basins (no ocean access) are treated

properties.label: Snow Accumulation
properties.description: Describe how snow accumulation over land and over sea-ice is treated

propertySets.label: Salt
propertySets.description: Global salt convervation properties of the model

properties.label: Ocean Seaice Interface
properties.description: Describe if/how salt is conserved at the ocean/sea-ice coupling interface

propertySets.label: Momentum
propertySets.description: Global momentum convervation properties of the model

properties.label: Details
properties.description: Describe if/how momentum is conserved in the model
